subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Ohio State outlasted second-seeded Memphis in the South Regional final, thanks to dominating performances from its two freshman stars: Mike Conley Jr. and Greg Oden.
snippet: Top-seeded Ohio State outlasted second-seeded Memphis in the South Regional final, thanks to dominating performances from its two freshman stars: Mike Conley Jr. and Greg Oden.
